notes.title: Daily Goals
notes.content: Today I want to focus on completing my React project features, practicing one coding problem, and reading about performance optimization. I will avoid distractions and track my progress every 2 hours.

notes.title: React Performance Tips
notes.content:
Use React.memo to prevent unnecessary re-renders.
Use useCallback for stable function references.
Use useMemo for expensive calculations.
Lazy load components using React.lazy() and Suspense.

notes.title: JavaScript Interview Prep
notes.content:
Revise closures, promises, async/await, event loop, and hoisting.
Practice array methods like map, filter, reduce.
Prepare output-based questions.

notes.title: Project Ideas
notes.content:
Build a notes app with search and tags.
Create a weather dashboard using API.
Develop a task manager with drag and drop.
Make a portfolio with animations.

notes.title: Learning Plan
notes.content:
Week 1 → Advanced JavaScript
Week 2 → React hooks deep dive
Week 3 → Next.js routing and API
Week 4 → Build full project

notes.title: Books to Read
notes.content:
Clean Code — Robert C. Martin
You Don’t Know JS — Kyle Simpson
Atomic Habits — James Clear
Deep Work — Cal Newport

notes.title: Fitness Routine
notes.content:
Morning walk 30 minutes
Pushups 3 sets
Stretching 10 minutes
Drink 3 liters of water daily

notes.title: Motivation Note
notes.content:
Stay consistent even when progress feels slow.
Small daily improvements lead to big success.
Discipline beats motivation.

notes.title: UI Design Tips
notes.content:
Use consistent spacing.
Follow color hierarchy.
Keep typography readable.
Avoid clutter.
Design mobile first.

notes.title: Important Reminders
notes.content:
Submit assignment before Friday.
Update LinkedIn profile.
Practice coding daily.
Backup project files.
